amends_amendment.description: Page 22, line 11, strike "and".    Page 22, after line 17 insert the following new subparagraph:.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to insert clarifying language relating to price gouging.

description: Amendment modifies the instruction prohibiting price gouging by replacing it with language discouraging price gouging.
purpose: An amendment to modify the instruction prohibiting price gouging by replacing it with language discouraging price gouging.
